title: an unknown directx error has occurred and league of legends cannot start
body:
Ever since the patch this week I get this error message immediately after champ select, right as it launches to full screen. I've googled the error and attempted the following solutions to no avail:

1. Using the integrated graphics as my default processor instead of my NVIDIA 870m GTX
2. Updating all drivers
3. Updating Windows (it was already up to date)
4. Reinstalling League

I'm not sure what else to try at this point. Does anybody know how to fix this?

replies.body: We're still working on a fix for this weird issue, but for the time being Sesh123 is on the right track. Try following [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115006740568--May-3-Click-here-if-you-ve-crashed-and-received-a-DirectX-error-or-if-you-see-an-offset-loading-screen-), while paying attention to which section you need (Windows/Mac) and you should be able to get back on the Rift.

dear riot, it has been like 3 weeks since i have been able to play because of this bug, i tried reinstalling league, updating everything i have, resetting every option i know, following every solution online and it still wont work. please tell me you r working on a solution :(
So i just unistalled and reinstalled the game and their is no "game.cfg" file

I am also having this issue. I tried a repair that didn't fix this.  I went into the game.cfg file and there isn't an option to change window mode.  Not sure what to do at this point, is there an ETA on a fix for this?

Had this issue with my Sapphire R9 dual-x 270, fixed the problem by rolling back the gpu drivers. Right now i'm using the radeon crimson drivers from March 2017 , works like a charm.

So maybe, instead of updating your gpu drivers, you should try downgrading them. Truth be told, if system is optimal, we shouldn't even update them in the first place.
nevermind. it works now after restarting my pc. try it!
The window mode did not work for me though. I'm actually on window mode ever since.

im still suffering this problem and i open the game.cfg file.... there no text to be seen to edit just says 
[General]
CfgVersion=7.9.6581 
thats all it says no scrolling options no other text... so ya.... no league on my comp still
When i do the steps for this It doesnt let me open with with wordpad their isnt an option to "Open with" like other game files have
